column1: The arms are bent in toward the body and the wrists and fingers are bent and held on the chest.
This type of posturing is a sign of severe damage in the brain.

Causes of decorticate posture include: - Bleeding in the brain from any cause - Brain stem tumor - Stroke - Brain problem due to drugs, poisoning, or infection - Head injury - Brain problem due to liver failure - Increased pressure in the brain from any cause - Primary brain tumor - Secondary brain tumor
The person will receive emergency treatment.
